short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows Fearn to access and communicate with your marketplaces.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage all aspects of your reselling business all in one place with Fearn.

Streamline your processes and stay on top of:

• Listing
• Cross-listing
• Delisting
• Shipping
• Returns
• Task Management
• Analytics
• Bookkeeping

By downloading this Chrome Extension, you'll connect to our currently supported marketplaces - eBay, Etsy, Mercari, and Poshmark - so that Fearn can do the heavy lifting for you. 

Cut down time spent onboarding with the "Merge" feature. Simply import all your listings from your various marketplaces and click the "Merge" button to merge them together into one consolidated listing.

Massively reduce your time spent tracking your sales, delisting, and more! With the click of the "Update" button, you will automatically update your sold listings from the platforms where they sold, delist those items from other platforms, create shipping tasks, and add your sales to analytics and bookkeeping.

Easily edit your listings from one place. Simply open up your listing on Fearn, change the title, description, price--or whatever you need--and Fearn will make those changes on the platform for you.

Requires a Fearn.co account, but if you haven't tried it yet - try it for 2 weeks free today!

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
